artist: Author: Text attributed to Francesco Colonna; Artist: Woodcut designs attributed to Benedetto Bordone; Publisher: Aldus Manutius for Leonardus Crassus; Printer: Aldus Manutius
catalogue_raissonne: Essling.1198; Morgan cat.II.373; Brunet.IV.778; Hain.5501; Proctor.5574
creditline: The Frank P. Leslie Collection, Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Frank P. Leslie in memory of Mr. and Mrs. John Leslie
description: Bound volume; full leather over boards; in chemise; in slipcase (binding of the period)
provenance: Mr. and Mrs. Frank P. Leslie, Wayzata, MInn.; given to MIA, 1967.
title: Hypnerotomachia Poliphili, ubi humana omnia non nisi somnium esse docet (Poliphilo's Dream about the Strife of Love)
